content: I'm trying to find some new snack ideas to add to my rotation. I've been having a sweet craving every afternoon, so I've been relying on dark chocolate or dried fruits. Do you have any healthier options that can satisfy my sweet tooth? By the way, I've been experimenting with different flavors of popcorn at home, and two weekends ago, I made a spicy Korean-inspired flavor with gochujang and soy sauce that turned out amazing!
